about_the_game:
"The Breakfive: Embroidered Uniform Guard," Traverse the storm, protect the Ming Dynasty!

OVERVIEW

This is an immersive live-action interactive drama that transports you to the Ming Empire, where you will personally experience a legendary story interwoven with political intrigue, love, friendship, and patriotism. Here, every choice you make will lead the game towards different outcomes, influencing the fate of the male protagonist and the Ming Dynasty.

STORY BACKGUOUND

In the eighteenth year of the Yongle era, while the Ming Empire appears to be peaceful and serene, it is actually rife with undercurrents. With the relocation project underway, numerous forces within the realm are beginning to stir. A massive conspiracy is brewing quietly, and the peaceful facade is about to be torn apart. The Jinyiwei, Dongchang, Wucheng Bingmasi, Zaoban Chu, as well as the crown prince, the heir apparent, princesses, and the Han King are all drawn into the chaos. You will join the male protagonist to unravel layers of mystery and investigate the roots of this conspiracy. The capital, teeming with undercurrents, is destined to face a storm of blood and carnage...



CORE GAMEPLAY

Interactive Investigation: Fight alongside the male protagonist, investigate, gather evidence, and deduce to uncover the massive conspiracy hidden beneath the surface of tranquility.
Choice Impact: Your choices will directly affect the development of the game's plot, character relationships, and the final outcome. Each decision must be made with care, as it will reshape history.
Emotional Entanglements: During the investigation, you will forge deep emotional connections with various characters, confronting love, friendship, brotherhood, and patriotism, dealing with betrayals from old acquaintances and alliances with new ones. How will you balance your emotions?

FEATURES

Multiple Storylines: Based on your choices, the game will present different plot directions and endings.
Deep Choices: Make tough decisions between love, friendship, brotherhood, and patriotism, experiencing the weight and significance of your choices.
Historical Atmosphere: Featuring exquisite scene design, realistic costumes and props, and era-appropriate sound effects and music. From the bustling capital to remote borderlands, from the opulence of the palace to the clamor of the streets, immerse yourself in the unique charm of the Ming Empire.
